DICT_NAME = #{dictName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update PHOIBE_DICT set DICT_KEY = #{dictKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DICT_NAME = #{dictName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUP_KEY = #{groupKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUP_NAME = #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_BY = #{order,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DICT_TYPE = #{dictType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DICT_STATUS = #{dictStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

sql.where:
1=1
and DICT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{param.dictName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and lower(DICT_KEY) LIKE '%'||#{param.dictKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and lower(GROUP_KEY) LIKE '%'||#{param.groupKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and GROUP_NAME LIKE '%'||#{param.groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and DICT_STATUS = #{param.dictStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
and DICT_TYPE = #{param.dictType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

mapper.select:
select * from (SELECT a.*,rownum rno FROM ( select
from PHOIBE_DICT
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sort} ) a ) t WHERE t.rno BETWEEN (#{start}*#{limit}+1) AND (#{start}*#{limit}+#{limit})
